document_data.name: Forbidden Plateau
document_data.region: [[Wu Pi Te Shao Mountains]], [[Utter East]], [[southeast Faerûn]]
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Forbidden Plateau''' was a high plateau lying beside a glacier in the [[Wu Pi Te Shao Mountains]] of the [[Yehimal]], in the [[Utter East]] of [[southeast Faerûn]]. It was the site of the [[Kingdom of Nix]].<ref group="note">The geographic location of Nix is determined by comparing the game map of ''[[Blood & Magic]]'' with standard maps of the region.

The only way to reach it was through the elusive [[Phantom Pass]], but even then, Nix only appeared once a year, around harvest-time. [[Vanesci Hamlet]], a [[human]] settlement, lay near the entrance in [[Konigheim]], many miles from Nix.

The almost-alien landscape around Nix was covered in slabs of gray stone and greenish swamps dotted with ponds. The trees were weirdly formed, with tendril-like branches and above-ground roots.
